Article.ArticleTitle: Successful Perioperative Management of a Patient with Gilbert Syndrome Posted for Double Valve Replacement with Tricuspid Valve Repair.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Anaesthesia, Ozone Anaesthesia Group, Kamalnayan Bajaj Hospital, Aurangabad, Maharashtra, India.
